import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Col, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' import SearchBox from '../components/SearchBox.js' import Product from "../components/Product" import { listProducts, getCategories } from '../actions/productActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const {products, error, loading, pages} = productList const productCategories = useSelector(state => state.productCategories) const { categories, success } = productCategories useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProducts()) dispatch(getCategories()) }, [dispatch]) return (

NutriNation
About Us Cart Categories}> {productCategories.categories.map((category) => (

{category}

))} {userInfo ? ( Hi, {userInfo.name}!} id='username' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> Profile Log Out ) : ( <> Log In Register ) } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Admin} id='adminmenu' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> Users Products Orders Promo Codes )}
) } export default Header
